content.description:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by four suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The next questions refer to the following 1908 cartoon from the British magazine Punch.

Reproduced with permission of Punch Ltd., www.punch.co.uk

Dreadnoughts were a new type of battleship. John Bull was a popular personiÔ¨Åcation of Great Britain.
content.question: Which of the following best describes the intended purpose of the cartoon?

choices.label: To argue for the desirability of more naval cooperation between Britain and Germany
To criticize the insular culture of British and German naval officers
To portray the British naval buildup as a justifiable reaction to a German threat
To criticize the aristocratic dominance of the British and German officer corps

content.answer: To portray the British naval buildup as a justifiable reaction to a German threat

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
